insights.title: Regional Trade Focus
insights.message: Rwanda's trade is concentrated in 6 regional blocks, with COMESA leading at $76.51M

insights.title: Growth Opportunities
insights.message: Several regional blocks show strong trade potential. CEPGL and SADC represent key growth areas.

insights.title: Diversification Needed
insights.message: Heavy concentration in specific regional blocks increases vulnerability to regional economic changes.

insights.title: Strategic Recommendations
insights.message: Consider strengthening trade relations with emerging regional blocks to diversify export markets and reduce dependency risks.
